verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Baba twakuomba
upokee sadaka yetu tunayoleta.
Ee Baba twakuomba
upokee vipaji vyetu tunavyoleta.
Ee Baba twakuomba,
ee Baba upokee.
Ee Baba upokee sadaka yetu.
(Ikupendeze ikupendeze,
ikupendeze ee Baba). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mkate na divai ni
mazao ya mashamba yetu.
Na kazi ya mikono yetu wanadamu,
tunakusihi upokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kama ulivyoipokea sadaka,
ya Abeli mtumishi wako,
tunakusihi upokee.
